sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import data from "../data"; function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); console.log(props); return (

  • {product.name}

  • {product.rating} Stars ({product.numReviews} Reviews)
  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description:
    {product.description}
  • Price: {product.price}
  • Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Unavailable."}
  • Qty:
  • {product.countInStock > 0 && ( )}
); } export default ProductScreen;
